detail_desc: Dress in patterned jersey with a sewn-in wrapover at the top, seam under the bust with a detachable tie belt, and 3/4-length sleeves.
Shirt jacket in sturdy jersey with a cutaway collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets, and press-studs at the cuffs.
Short, fitted dress in lace with a scallop-edge V-neck front and back, a concealed zip at the back, long sleeves and raw scalloped edges at the cuffs and hem. Partly lined.
Lace bras with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Straight T-shirt in soft, airy viscose slub jersey with a deep V-neck.
Two-strand, thin metal chain necklace with small round pendants. Adjustable length.
Short dress in a washed viscose weave with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
High-waisted shorts in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved cardigan in sequin-embroidered tulle with a V-neck and concealed button at the front. Lined in woven fabric.
Sleeveless playsuit in printed cotton jersey with a narrow, elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, and small frill trim at the hems.

Blouse in woven fabric with details in a Tencel™ lyocell blend. Small stand-up collar, frill-trimmed pin-tucks at the top and buttons down the front. Gathered yoke at the back, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs with a frill trim.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and tapered legs. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Ties at the back and back of the neck. Light lift.
Calf-length skirt in a soft knit containing some wool. High waist with a wide, ribbed waistband, a ribbed hem and a slit at the back. The polyester content of the skirt is recycled.
Dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck and wrapover top with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Seam at the waist with pleats and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Tube scarf in a soft knit. Width 65 cm, circumference 166 cm.
Sleeveless dresses in soft cotton jersey with a seam at the top and a gathered, gently flared skirt. One dress has a chest pocket.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved lace top with a small stand-up collar and concealed zip at the back. Lined.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in soft, stretch twill with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.

Two-button jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket with a lining that can be used as a decorative handkerchief, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. One button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and wide, foldover ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck tops in organic cotton jersey.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Warm-lined boots in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with elastication at the top and long sleeves.

Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed, elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets. Gently tapered legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, covered buttons at the top and short sleeves. Two elasticated seams and a decorative drawstring at the waist, and a flounced hem. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a slit and covered buttons at the cuffs, and a curved hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a detachable belt in braided imitation suede.

Blouse in an airy weave with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top to create soft draping front and back. Opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, and a gently rounded hem.
Ballet pumps with a decorative elastic bow on the front with metal tips. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and smooth soles.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with an elastic strap over the foot. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Cotton hairbands with a bow at the front and covered elastic at the back.

Jacket in soft faux shearling with a collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Patch front pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Cotton jersey lining.

Fully lined, super push-up balconette bikini top with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood. Deep V-neck with lacing at the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length dress in softly draping jersey crêpe with a V-neck, seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist and a wide A-line skirt. Lined over the bust.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Jumper in a soft fine-knit viscose blend with a collar, button placket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms a frill trim at the front and narrow ties at the sides. Low waist.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck front and back, long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.

Shirt in softly draping viscose twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, a seam with a drawstring under the bust and long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem.
Slightly shorter, long-sleeved top in jersey crêpe made from a viscose blend with a round neckline, an opening at the back and a double-layered panel at the hem with ties at the back.
Shorts in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly with buttons, patch front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short, A-line skirt with buttons down the front.
Ankle-length chinos in sturdy cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Front pockets, welt back pockets and straight legs with creases.
Nursing jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. High slits in the sides for easier nursing access. Slightly longer at the back.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Front and back pockets and tapered legs.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Short skirt in cotton corduroy. High paper bag waist with covered elastication, a diagonal fastening with covered buttons down the front, and side pockets. Unlined.
Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in soft cotton jersey with lace details. Top with a gentle V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Short dress in sequin-embroidered mesh with a small stand-up collar, an opening and two buttons at the back of the neck and short, wide sleeves. Jersey lining.
Fitted, calf-length dress with a round neckline, long sleeves, a seam with draped detailing at the waist, and a gently flared skirt.
Slightly shorter, gently fitted, long-sleeved top in stretch jersey with a soft, brushed finish.
Short 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and raw-edge hem.

Set with a sleeveless dress and pair of puff pants in a cotton weave. Dress with broderie anglaise and a flounced trim at the front that continues back over the shoulders. Buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined. Puff pants with elastication at the waist hems.
Fluffy jacket in soft pile with a collar, concealed zip down the front and concealed pockets in the side seams. Lined.
V-neck blouse in an airy viscose weave with inset lace trims around the neckline and butterfly sleeves.

Coat in a felted wool blend with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and buttons down the front. Chest pocket, welt side pockets, two inner pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
5-pocket, high-waisted trousers in washed stretch twill with a zip fly and button, and slim legs.

Short blouse in a lightweight viscose weave with an appliqué at the top, a wrapover edge at the back of the neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Longer at the front with a tie.
Sleeveless top in woven fabric with covered elastication at the top, narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow, and a narrow, elasticated seam at the hem with a peplum.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined, wrapover hood and ribbing at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, and side pockets.
Short, fitted jersey top with narrow shoulder straps.
Boxer shorts in microfibre with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. High waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs with raw-edge hems. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a boat neck and long raglan sleeves. Gathers in the sides for best fit.
All-in-one pyjamas in organic cotton jersey with a rounded collar, chest pocket and press-studs down the front, at the crotch and down the insides of the legs.
Short-sleeved top in linen jersey with a V-neck.
Studio Collection. Short-sleeved shirt woven in a linen blend containing some cupro with a resort collar and buttons down the front.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Ankle-length yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing at the top that holds in and shapes the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband and legs with sheer, shimmering sections.
